incidents.name: Elevated latency and error rate in Dialogflow agent integration

incident_updates.body: The issue with Dialogflow agent integrations has been resolved for all affected users. The services are operating normally at this time. We appreciate your patience and understanding during this period.

Dialogflow agent integrations in US1 Region are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 min or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating a service degradation with Dialogflow agent integrations affecting US1 Region experiencing elevated error rates and latency interacting with Dialogflow agents. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available

Our engineers have identified a service degradation with DialogFlow cx e2e affecting US1 Region increasing error rates and latency interacting with Dialogflow agents. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available

incidents.name: TaskRouter Had Service Degradation (API 500s Failures) Impacting Flex and TaskRouter Customers

incident_updates.body: TaskRouter service was degraded for 7 minutes between 13:01 UTC and 13:07 UTC on 05/13/2025. During this period, customers would have experienced their API request failed with 500 errors.  The issue has already been resolved and the team is actively monitoring to ensure no recurrence.
We've become aware of a potential issue with TaskRouter. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Degradation with Programmable Voice s Virtual Agent with Google Dialogflow

incident_updates.body: Virtual Agents with Google Dialogflow has been resolved and Programmable Voice is operating normally at this time.

Programmable Voice customers connecting to Virtual Agents with Google Dialogflow should now be operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Programmable Voice customers connecting to Virtual Agents may experience connection errors to their virtual agent due to an issue with Google Dialogflow. We have escalated to Google and will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Connect/VirtualAgent. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Customers Unable to Submit V2 Sender ID Applications for AU

incident_updates.body: Sender ID Applications for Australia submitted via the New Sender ID Application experience were degraded from 05/07/2025 14:19 PDT to 05/12/2025 14:41:53 PDT. During this period of time, some customers who opted to use this new experience to apply for Sender IDs in Australia were unable to complete their submissions when. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers Are Investigating an Issue

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the Programmable Voice issue triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Programmable Voice. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Errors Accessing Voice Recordings Metadata

incident_updates.body: From 10:00 PM PT on May 11, 2025 until  8:58 AM PT on May 12, 2025, customers may have sporadically received errors when attempting to access lists of recordings from the List Recordings endpoint. This issue has been resolved.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Programmable Voice. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.
